svg.content: <mxfile host="65bd71144e"> <diagram name="S3 Multi-Bucket Architecture" id="s3-multi-bucket"> <mxGraphModel dx="849" dy="754" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1400" pageHeight="1000" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0"/> <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/> <mxCell id="2" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">S3 Multi-Bucket Architecture</h1><p>Generic S3-compatible storage supporting multiple buckets<br>Each bucket configured independently with encrypted credentials</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontSize=21;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="40" width="600" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3" value="CMS Frontend" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#E1D5E7;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="180" width="300" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4" value="StorageOverview Component<br>─────────────<br>• Lists all StorageDto docs<br>• Create/Edit/Delete buckets<br>• Test connections<br>• Manage credentials" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="230" width="300" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5" value="storageSelection Composable<br>─────────────<br>• Query buckets by type<br>• Filter Image/Media buckets<br>• Auto-select single bucket<br>• Get bucket by ID" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="350" width="300" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6" value="Database (CouchDB/IndexedDB)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#D5E8D4;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="180" width="300" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7" value="StorageDto Documents<br>─────────────<br>• _id: bucketId<br>• name: string<br>• storageType: Image|Media<br>• publicUrl: string<br>• mimeTypes: string[]<br>• credential_id?: Uuid<br>• memberOf: Uuid[]" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="230" width="300" height="140" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8" value="Encrypted Credentials<br>─────────────<br>• Stored in Crypto documents<br>• Referenced by credential_id<br>• Decrypted on-demand<br>• Auto-updated on changes" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="390" width="300" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9" value="API Backend" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#DAE8FC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="520" width="660" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="10" value="S3Service (Singleton Pattern)<br>─────────────<br>• Static Map cache<br>• One instance per bucketId<br>• Auto-cleanup after 10min<br>• Listens to DB changes<br>• Updates on credential changes<br>• Methods:<br> - create(bucketId, db)<br> - uploadFile(key, file, mime)<br> - getObject(key)<br> - removeObjects(keys[])<br> - checkConnection()" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="570" width="300" height="180" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="11" value="Minio Client<br>(Generic S3 Client)<br>─────────────<br>• Works with any S3-compatible service<br>• AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO, etc.<br>• Configured per bucket<br>• Handles SSL/endpoint parsing" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="570" width="300" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="12" value="S3 Storage Services" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#F8CECC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="780" width="620" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="13" value="Image Bucket<br>(storageType: Image)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="830" width="120" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="14" value="Media Bucket<br>(storageType: Media)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=10" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="830" width="120" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="15" value="Image Bucket 2<br>(Multiple instances)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="830" width="120" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16" value="Media Bucket 2<br>(Multiple instances)" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=10" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="830" width="120" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="17" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="4" target="7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5" target="7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="19" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="7" target="8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="20" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="8" target="10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="21" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="10" target="11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="11" target="13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="11" target="14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="24" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="11" target="15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="11" target="16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="26" value="Key Features" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FFE6CC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="180" width="300" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="27" value="✅ Multiple Buckets<br>• Each bucket is independent<br>• Own credentials &amp; endpoint<br>• Type-based filtering (Image/Media)<br><br>✅ Generic S3 Client<br>• Works with any S3-compatible service<br>• AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO, etc.<br><br>✅ Secure Credentials<br>• Encrypted before storage<br>• Auto-updated on changes<br>• Never stored in plain text<br><br>✅ Efficient Caching<br>• Singleton pattern per bucket<br>• Auto-cleanup after inactivity<br>• Reuses existing connections" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="230" width="300" height="240" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="28" value="Usage Flow" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FFE6CC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="520" width="300" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="29" value="1. CMS queries StorageDto docs<br> from database<br><br>2. User selects bucket for upload<br><br>3. API receives bucketId<br><br>4. S3Service.create(bucketId, db)<br> • Gets StorageDto from DB<br> • Retrieves encrypted credentials<br> • Creates/returns cached instance<br><br>5. Minio client connects to S3<br> service (AWS, R2, MinIO, etc.)<br><br>6. File uploaded to selected bucket" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;fontSize=10;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="570" width="300" height="200" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="30" value="Data Structures" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FFE6CC;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="800" width="300" height="30" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="31" value="StorageDto<br>─────────────<br>{<br> _id: string<br> type: "storage"<br> name: string<br> storageType: "image"|"media"<br> publicUrl: string<br> mimeTypes: string[]<br> credential_id?: string<br> memberOf: string[]<br>}" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;fontSize=9;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="850" width="140" height="130" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="32" value="S3CredentialDto<br>─────────────<br>{<br> endpoint: string<br> bucketName: string<br> accessKey: string<br> secretKey: string<br>}" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;align=left;fontSize=9;fontFamily=Verdana;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="880" y="850" width="140" height="100" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
